He scored the first two touchdowns of his comeback in a December 2009 rout of the Falcons at the Dome.`` I'll never forget this day,'' an emotional Michael Vick said after the game. I'll never forget coming back to the city of Atlanta. I'll never forget arriving yesterday. I'll never forget seeing a lot of the landmarks I used to see when I lived in this city for six years. I'll never forget shedding a tear on the bus ride over here this morning because I took that route every Sunday to come here and play. Former Brave Jeff Francoeur signed a sweet deal with the Royals. Robert Thompson points out that, as a British unknown looking for American fame, Simon Cowell used meanness as a savvy PR move- one that wouldn't work for Jennifer Lopez or Stephen Tyler . Outside of the music industry, no one in the United States knew who Simon Cowell was until he started making nasty comments during the first season promotions for the show, he says.`` Being mean was what made him a celebrity.
